thread.section_title: Redspot Car Rentals Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Redspot Car Rentals | redspot.com.au | 3 of 707
thread.title: Jennifer
thread.title_full: Redspot Car Rentals reviewed by Jennifer

author: Jennifer
title: Jennifer
text: Red spot themselves were wonder, accommodating and the car was great but our experiences was hindered due to the terrible agent who we booked through. We booked through Angus Car Hire Agency and had a terrible experience dealing with them, with multiple error on our booking and being given the wrong information.
